name: Shame Of Humanity
description: I developed one. I've done a game on creating awareness and survival completely. I wanted to touch the poverty and poverty in Africa. I wanted to make a play revealing reality, especially for children who died of mosquitoes or minor illness. I had to turn in the game before I could fix the mistakes. May poison water and mushrooms. Apples and bananas ensure survival. It's hard to die, but so is winning. Stay away from mosquitoes. They are your only enemy except fatigue.
